_header: Man have mind and thee amend / Of all thy miss…
Note: This piece is closely related to 3349; see also 5789.
_description: ‘This warld is verra vanite’ — seven 12-line stanzas (ababaabbcbc) with this refrain

NLS3473.First Lines:
Man haue mynd and þe AmendOf all thi mys quhill at þou
                    may…
NLS3473.Last Lines:
…Now man haue mynd & þe amendÞis warld Is verray
                    vanite
NLS3473.Note: Nineteenth-century translation (six stanzas) is Edinburgh,  Edinburgh University Library La.III.450/1 [olim Laing 450], ff. 86-87.
